name: optimize
description: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks with measured improvements
steps: Baseline Capture: Measure current performance metrics, identify hot paths
Optimization Targeting: Load `protocol-optimize.md`, map bottlenecks to categories
Strategy Selection: GC tuning, memory layout, render pipeline, physics step optimization
Implementation: Apply optimization incrementally, measure after each change
Verification: Confirm metrics improved, verify no functional regressions
